name: Get ya house
description:
You are in a forest and survived with a camp fire and a sleeping bag but now it start to feel cold each night, so you know you will need an house to survive easely. So you need to go at woodman's place. He will give you something for your quest, now it's time to work to get your house !

Controls : 

awsd : moving

h : using axe

The game was supposed to be way longer, but I didn't have enough time to develop it,  there could have been a "windowman" which would have done the window of the house for 3 sandbag, and a "furnitureman" which would have given you some furniture ( a bed, a chair ect... ) in exchange of a rare shell ( these both could have been found on the beach ).It's not as fun as expected, but at least, the theme is in the game ;) ( since each cut tree count for a part of the house )

SPOIL ( read only if you get lost )

Full info of what you need to do :

-go to woodman

-wait a few second until the dialog appear

- go cut the 10 trees with round leaves

- go to woodman again

- the house is now built, it's the end, you can see  it finished at your spawn. touch escape to quit the game
